Text: The course Deutsch ? warum nicht?, is divided into four parts. Each of the four series contains 26 lessons with dialogue, exercises and audios to download. The course covers levels A1 to B1 of the European Framework of Reference for Languages and is geared toward beginners and advanced learners. Deutsch ? warum nicht? was produced by Deutsche Welle and the Goethe Institute.
